item.title: Yealink Entry Level IP Phone (With PoE) SKU: SIP-T40P
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: The Yealink T40P remains the ideal solution for office environments that require an elegant and visually appealing IP phone solution. While remaining easy to use and highly functional at its core, the Yealink T40P also features up to 3 x SIP accounts, HD voice and 2 x 10/100 Ethernet ports
item.content:encoded:
The Yealink T40P remains the ideal solution for office environments that require an elegant and visually appealing IP phone solution. While remaining easy to use and highly functional at its core, the Yealink T40P also features up to 3 x SIP accounts, HD voice and 2 x 10/100 Ethernet ports with POE support.

 

Features:

  • 2.3″ 132×64 Pixel Back Light LCD Display
  • 2 x Ethernet Ports 10/100 POE Support
  • 3 x SIP Accounts
  • 3 x Line Keys
  • Wall-mountable
  • High Definition Voice Support

item.title: Yealink Entry Level IP Phone (With PoE) SKU: SIP-T21P E2
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: The Yealink T21P E2 sets a new standard in the entry-level IP phone market. By making use of high quality materials and offering features such as a large 132×64 pixel LCD backlight display, dual 10/100Mbps Ethernet ports and up to 2 SIP accounts the Yealink T21P E2 is the ideal,
item.content:encoded:
The Yealink T21P E2 sets a new standard in the entry-level IP phone market. By making use of high quality materials and offering features such as a large 132×64 pixel LCD backlight display, dual 10/100Mbps Ethernet ports and up to 2 SIP accounts the Yealink T21P E2 is the ideal, cost effective, IP phone for any office environment. Additionally the Yealink T21P E2 supports power over Ethernet (PoE) to help centralise your instillation and improve ease of deployment.

 

Features:

  • 2.3″ 132×64 Pixel Back Light LCD Display
  • 2 x Ethernet Ports 10/100 POE Support
  • 2 x SIP Accounts
  • 2 x Line Keys
  • Wall-mountable
  • High Definition Voice Support

item.title: Yealink Entry Level IP Phone (Non PoE) SKU: SIP-T21 E2
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: The Yealink T21 E2 sets a new standard in the entry-level IP phone market. By making use of high quality materials and offering features such as a large 132×64 pixel LCD backlight display, dual 10/100Mbps Ethernet ports and up to 2 SIP accounts the Yealink T21 E2 is the ideal,
item.content:encoded:
The Yealink T21 E2 sets a new standard in the entry-level IP phone market. By making use of high quality materials and offering features such as a large 132×64 pixel LCD backlight display, dual 10/100Mbps Ethernet ports and up to 2 SIP accounts the Yealink T21 E2 is the ideal, cost effective, IP phone for any office environment. Additionally the Yealink T21 E2 includes a power supply for independent operation.

 

Features:

  • 2.3″ 132X64 Pixel Back Light LCD Display
  • 2X Ethernet Ports 10/100 None POE
  • 2X SIP Accounts
  • 2X Line Keys
  • Wall-mountable
  • High Definition Voice Support
  • PSU Included

item.title: Yealink DECT Cordless Handset SKU: W56H
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: The Yealink W56H cordless handset allows you to extend the number of users whilst providing increased flexibility and scalability when used in conjunction with the W60P handset and base station.   Features: Additional Handset for W60P Compatible with the Yealink Multi-Cell DECT solution (W80B/W80B-DM)
item.content:encoded:
The Yealink W56H cordless handset allows you to extend the number of users whilst providing increased flexibility and scalability when used in conjunction with the W60P handset and base station.

 

Features:

  • Additional Handset for W60P
  • Compatible with the Yealink Multi-Cell DECT solution (W80B/W80B-DM)

item.title: Yealink DECT Cordless Handset SKU: W52H
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: The Yealink SIP-W52H cordless handset allows you to extend the number of users whilst providing increased flexibility and scalability when used in conjunction with the Yealink W52P handset and base station.   Features: Additional Handset for W52P
item.content:encoded:
The Yealink SIP-W52H cordless handset allows you to extend the number of users whilst providing increased flexibility and scalability when used in conjunction with the Yealink W52P handset and base station.

 

Features:

  • Additional Handset for W52P

item.title: Yealink w52p
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: The Yealink W52P IP DECT phone is designed to cater for a wide range of SMB and SOHO environments and allows users to conveniently make calls while not being seated at their desk. The Yealink W52P provides clear audio and enables easy communication thanks to its HD audio capabilities. The
item.content:encoded:
The Yealink W52P IP DECT phone is designed to cater for a wide range of SMB and SOHO environments and allows users to conveniently make calls while not being seated at their desk. The Yealink W52P provides clear audio and enables easy communication thanks to its HD audio capabilities. The Yealink W52P supports up to 4 simultaneous calls per base station and offers features such as intercom, 3-way conferencing and speed dialling.

 

Features:

  • 1.8″ 128X160 Pixel Back Light Colour LCD Display
  • 1 x Ethernet Ports 10/100 POE Support (Base)
  • Up to 5 x SIP Accounts
  • Up to 10 Hours Talk Time, 100 Hours Standby
  • Up to 50M Indoors, 300M Outdoors
  • Up to 4 Simultaneous External Calls
  • High Definition Voice Support
  • Desktop / Wall Mountable
